entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:48 p.m. EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
